Name: Ember Crusade IV
About the game: NOTICE: Save data from the Ember Crusade IV Demo will carry over to the full game. Ember Crusade IV is a twin stick looter shooter roguelike where you embark on a blazing crusade to save the solar system from a demonic invasion. Collect hundreds of guns, armor and materials to create the ultimate crusader. Take to the randomly generated battlefield, dodge rolling, shooting, reloading and pulverizing your enemies into a very fine bloody pâté . Ember Crusade IV features: Visceral combat 7 Planets Hundreds of guns 3 Powerful crusaders Fight through seven distinct planets as one of three powerful crusaders: The Justicar , Marauder and Gunmancer . Each crusader brings a unique ability to the battlefield, like throwing holy hammers at enemies, or summoning guns made out of bone to fight alongside you.
